## `SearchForBrokenLinks`

Sets whether to build a list of broken links\index{web harvester!quality checking files} during a web harvest.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SearchForBrokenLinks(boolean use)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `boolean` use | `true` to check for broken links while harvesting. |
:::
